title: The Long Shot (1939) HORSE RACE DRAMA

sources.title: The Long Shot (1939) HORSE RACE DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Gordon Jones, Marsha Hunt, C. Henry Gordon 
Director: Charles Lamont

It seems as if a string of bad luck is causing a horse trainer to lose everything, but his niece discovers that a crooked rival is paying her uncle's jockeys to throw their races!
